snippet: The United Nations refugee agency said Wednesday that it was working to seek $274 million in emergency donations to support refugees fleeing violence in the Central African Republic.
abstract: United Nations refugee agency says it is working with 14 other humanitarian relief groups to seek $274 million in emergency donations to support the swelling population of refugees fleeing violence in the Central African Republic.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations refugee agency said Wednesday that it was working to seek $274 million in emergency donations to support refugees fleeing violence in the Central African Republic.

headline.main: Central African Republic: Aid Sought for Those Fleeing Unrest
headline.print_headline: Central African Republic: Aid Sought for Those Fleeing Unrest
